projects.title: Propforce - Enterprise Real Estate SaaS Platform
projects.summary: Developed a comprehensive SaaS platform for real estate operations, trusted by industry leaders Zameen.com and Bayut.com. Streamlined sales management, marketing automation, and CRM for enterprise-scale real estate businesses.
projects.challenge: Creating a scalable, multi-tenant SaaS platform that could handle high-traffic operations for major real estate portals while maintaining performance and user experience across different user roles (agents, developers, clients).
projects.approach: Implemented a modern React-based frontend with TypeScript for type safety, designed reusable components for scalability, and collaborated closely with backend engineers to ensure seamless API integration and optimal user workflows.
projects.solution: Built an intuitive, responsive platform with role-based dashboards, real-time analytics, automated marketing tools, and comprehensive CRM capabilities. Focused on performance optimization and enterprise-grade scalability to support thousands of concurrent users.

adoption.label: Enterprise Adoption
adoption.description: Successfully deployed on Zameen.com and Bayut.com

efficiency.label: Operational Efficiency
efficiency.description: Improvement in lead conversion and customer satisfaction

scale.label: Platform Scale
scale.description: Handles high volumes of users and transactions

testimonials.name: Product Manager, Zameen.com
testimonials.quote: Propforce has revolutionized our real estate operations, providing the scalability and efficiency we needed for our growing platform.

testimonials.name: Technical Lead, Bayut.com
testimonials.quote: The intuitive UI and seamless integration capabilities made Propforce the perfect solution for our enterprise needs.

media.caption: Propforce platform theme showcasing the comprehensive real estate SaaS interface with affiliate management
Propforce application interface highlighting the enterprise-scale platform features and user experience
Propforce cover design demonstrating the professional branding and platform overview

projects.title: OLMT-AP - Employee Management System
projects.summary: Developed a comprehensive employee and station management system for Orange Line Mass Transit, streamlining operations and improving efficiency.
projects.challenge: The Orange Line Mass Transit system needed a centralized platform to manage employees across different stations, track schedules, and maintain operational records.
projects.approach: Built a RESTful API with Node.js and Express.js, implemented MySQL database for data persistence, and created an intuitive user interface for station managers.
projects.solution: Created a robust management system with employee registration, station assignment, schedule tracking, and reporting capabilities. Implemented secure authentication and role-based access control.

accuracy.label: Data Accuracy
accuracy.description: Reduction in manual data entry errors

testimonials.name: Station Manager
testimonials.quote: The system has greatly improved our ability to manage staff and track operations across all stations.

media.caption: Employee management dashboard showing station assignments and schedules

projects.title: 4Pai - Online Animal Marketplace
projects.summary: Built an online marketplace for animals with integrated veterinary certification facility, ensuring safe and verified transactions.
projects.challenge: Creating a trustworthy platform for animal trading that includes proper verification processes and secure payment handling.
projects.approach: Implemented comprehensive backend services with payment integration, file storage, and verification workflows for veterinary certifications.
projects.solution: Developed a secure marketplace with Stripe payment integration, AWS S3 for document storage, and automated verification processes for veterinary certifications.

testimonials.name: Pet Owner
testimonials.quote: The verification process gave me confidence in purchasing my pet safely.

media.caption: Animal marketplace interface with verification badges

projects.title: Golfy-AP - Golf Tournament Management
projects.summary: Created a comprehensive golf tournament management system with real-time scoring, leaderboards, and tournament administration features.
projects.challenge: Golf tournaments require real-time score updates, live leaderboards, and comprehensive tournament management capabilities.
projects.approach: Implemented real-time features using WebSockets for live score updates and built an intuitive interface for tournament organizers and participants.
projects.solution: Developed a complete tournament management platform with real-time scoring, automated leaderboard updates, player registration, and comprehensive reporting.

testimonials.name: Tournament Director
testimonials.quote: The real-time scoring and leaderboard features made our tournaments much more engaging for participants.

media.caption: Real-time leaderboard showing live tournament scores

projects.title: Pneumonia Predictor - ML Model
projects.summary: Developed a machine learning model using R to predict pneumonia using clustering, classification, and decision tree algorithms.
projects.challenge: Creating an accurate predictive model for pneumonia diagnosis using medical data with various machine learning approaches.
projects.approach: Implemented multiple ML algorithms including clustering for data segmentation, classification for prediction, and decision trees for interpretable results.
projects.solution: Built a comprehensive R-based solution with data preprocessing, feature engineering, and model evaluation using multiple algorithms for pneumonia prediction.

algorithms.label: ML Techniques
algorithms.description: Clustering, Classification, and Decision Trees implemented

testimonials.name: Medical Researcher
testimonials.quote: The model shows promising results for early pneumonia detection.

media.caption: Model performance visualization showing accuracy metrics
